sql.where:
BOARD_NUM > 0
AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
AND BOARD_CONTENTS LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
AND BOARD_WRITER LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA_INFO ( BOARD_NUM, BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_TITLE, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, BOARD_HIT, BOARD_CONTENTS, BOARD_CATEGORY, REF, STEP, DEPTH ) VALUES ( #{board_num}, #{board_writer}, #{board_title}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 0 , #{board_contents} ,'Q', #{board_num} , 0, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT QI.*, QFN.* FROM QNA_INFO QI LEFT JOIN QNA_FILE_INFO QFN ON (QI.BOARD_NUM = QFN.BOARD_NUM) WHERE QI.BOARD_NUM = #{board_num} and DEL = 0
mapper.delete: UPDATE QNA_INFO SET DEL = 1 WHERE BOARD_NUM = #{board_num}
